user_stories.title: As a Test Engineer, I want to define an LLM test case with a prompt, expected output, and metadata so that I can specify what an LLM should be tested against.
user_stories.description: This user story focuses on enabling Test Engineers to create new LLM test case definitions. It involves specifying the input (prompt), the desired or acceptable output, and important metadata like test case name, description, and tags.
acceptance_criteria: System allows creation of a new test case definition.
A test case definition includes a 'prompt' field (string).
A test case definition includes an 'expectedOutput' field (string or JSON schema).
A test case definition includes 'name' and 'description' fields.
A test case definition allows for 'tags' (array of strings) for categorization.
The API endpoint for creating test cases is secured.

tasks.title: Design LLM Test Case Data Model
tasks.description: Define the JSON schema for an LLM test case including prompt, expectedOutput, name, description, and tags.

tasks.title: Implement POST /llm-test-cases API endpoint
tasks.description: Develop the backend endpoint to receive and store new LLM test case definitions in the database.

tasks.title: Implement data validation for new test cases
tasks.description: Ensure that incoming test case data conforms to the defined schema and business rules (e.g., prompt cannot be empty).

tasks.title: Write unit and integration tests for test case creation
tasks.description: Develop automated tests to verify the correct functionality and error handling of the test case creation API.

user_stories.title: As a Test Engineer, I want to retrieve, update, and delete LLM test cases so that I can manage my test suite effectively.
user_stories.description: This story covers the CRUD operations for managing existing LLM test case definitions, allowing Test Engineers to view, modify, and remove them as needed.
acceptance_criteria: System allows retrieval of a single test case by ID.
System allows retrieval of all test cases, with optional filtering by tags or name.
System allows updating specific fields of an existing test case.
System allows deletion of an existing test case by ID.
All API endpoints for managing test cases are secured and require appropriate authentication.

tasks.title: Implement GET /llm-test-cases and GET /llm-test-cases/{id} API endpoints
tasks.description: Develop API endpoints for retrieving lists of test cases and individual test cases based on ID.

tasks.title: Implement PUT /llm-test-cases/{id} API endpoint
tasks.description: Develop the backend endpoint to update an existing LLM test case definition.

tasks.title: Implement DELETE /llm-test-cases/{id} API endpoint
tasks.description: Develop the backend endpoint to delete an LLM test case definition from the database.

tasks.title: Add authorization checks to all test case management endpoints
tasks.description: Ensure that only authorized users can perform read, update, and delete operations on test cases.

user_stories.title: As a Developer, I want a well-documented API for LLM test case management so that I can easily integrate with other systems.
user_stories.description: This story focuses on ensuring that the API endpoints for defining and managing LLM test cases are thoroughly documented, making it easier for other developers to integrate with the system.
acceptance_criteria: API documentation (e.g., OpenAPI/Swagger) is generated for all LLM test case endpoints.
Documentation clearly defines request and response schemas for each endpoint.
Documentation includes example requests and responses.
All error codes and their meanings are documented.

tasks.title: Integrate OpenAPI/Swagger generation into the API
tasks.description: Set up tooling to automatically generate API documentation from code annotations or definitions.

tasks.title: Annotate all LLM test case endpoints for documentation
tasks.description: Add necessary comments and annotations to the API code to ensure accurate documentation generation.

tasks.title: Review and refine generated API documentation
tasks.description: Manually inspect the generated documentation for clarity, completeness, and accuracy.

tasks.title: Publish API documentation to a discoverable location
tasks.description: Make the API documentation accessible to internal and external developers.
